net.sf.ntru.encrypt

Class NtruEncrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.ntru.encrypt.NtruEncrypt

  • public class NtruEncrypt
extends java.lang.Object
    Encrypts, decrypts data and generates key pairs.
    The parameter p is hardcoded to 3.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NtruEncrypt(EncryptionParameters params)
      Constructs a new instance with a set of encryption parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] data, EncryptionKeyPair kp)
      Decrypts a message.
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] m, EncryptionPublicKey pubKey)
      Encrypts a message.
      EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPair()
      Generates a new encryption key pair using two threads if possible.
      EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPair(char[] passphrase, byte[] salt)
      Generates an encryption key pair from a passphrase using two threads if possible.
      EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPairSingleThread()
      Generates a new encryption key pair in a single thread.
      EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPairSingleThread(char[] passphrase, byte[] salt)
      Generates an encryption key pair from a passphrase in a single thread.
      byte[] generateSalt()
      A convenience method that generates a random 128-bit salt vector for key pair generation.

        Constructs a new instance with a set of encryption parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • generateKeyPair

        public EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPair()
        Generates a new encryption key pair using two threads if possible.
        Returns:
        a key pair

      • generateKeyPairSingleThread

        public EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPairSingleThread()
        Generates a new encryption key pair in a single thread.
        Returns:
        a key pair

      • generateKeyPair

        public EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPair(char[] passphrase,
                                byte[] salt)
        Generates an encryption key pair from a passphrase using two threads if possible.
        Invoking this method with the same passphrase and salt will always return the same key pair.
        Parameters:
        passphrase -
        salt - salt for the passphrase; can be null but this is strongly discouraged
        Returns:
        a key pair

      • generateKeyPairSingleThread

        public EncryptionKeyPair generateKeyPairSingleThread(char[] passphrase,
                                            byte[] salt)
        Generates an encryption key pair from a passphrase in a single thread.
        Invoking this method with the same passphrase and salt will always return the same key pair.
        Parameters:
        passphrase -
        salt - salt for the passphrase; can be null but this is strongly discouraged
        Returns:
        a key pair

      • generateSalt

        public byte[] generateSalt()
        A convenience method that generates a random 128-bit salt vector for key pair generation.
        Returns:
        a new salt vector

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] m,
             EncryptionPublicKey pubKey)
        Encrypts a message.
        See P1363.1 section 9.2.2.
        Parameters:
        m - The message to encrypt
        pubKey - the public key to encrypt the message with
        Returns:
        the encrypted message
        Throws:
        NtruException - if the JRE doesn't implement the specified hash algorithm, the message is longer than maxLenBytes, or maxLenBytes is greater than 255

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] data,
             EncryptionKeyPair kp)
        Decrypts a message.
        See P1363.1 section 9.2.3.
        Parameters:
        data - The message to decrypt
        kp - a key pair that contains the public key the message was encrypted with, and the corresponding private key
        Returns:
        the decrypted message
        Throws:
        NtruException - if the JRE doesn't implement the specified hash algorithm, the encrypted data is invalid, or maxLenBytes is greater than 255
